00019 /*! \file
00020  *
00021  * \brief Provide Open Settlement Protocol capability

00023  * \author Mark Spencer <markster@digium.com>

00064 #define MAX_CERTS 10
00065 #define MAX_SERVICEPOINTS 10
00066 #define OSP_MAX 256
00067 
00068 #define OSP_DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS 20
00069 #define OSP_DEFAULT_RETRY_DELAY     0
00070 #define OSP_DEFAULT_RETRY_LIMIT     2
00071 #define OSP_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT         500
00072 
00073 static int loadPemCert(unsigned char *FileName, unsigned char *buffer, int *len);
00074 static int loadPemPrivateKey(unsigned char *FileName, unsigned char *buffer, int *len);
00075 
00076 AST_MUTEX_DEFINE_STATIC(osplock);
00077 
00078 static int initialized = 0;
00079 static int hardware = 0;
00080 static unsigned tokenformat = TOKEN_ALGO_SIGNED;
00081 
00082 struct osp_provider {
00083    char name[OSP_MAX];
00084    char localpvtkey[OSP_MAX];
00085    char localcert[OSP_MAX];
00086    char cacerts[MAX_CERTS][OSP_MAX]; 
00087    int cacount;
00088    char servicepoints[MAX_SERVICEPOINTS][OSP_MAX];
00089    char source[OSP_MAX];
00090    int spcount;
00091    int dead;
00092    int maxconnections;
00093    int retrydelay;
00094    int retrylimit;
00095    int timeout;
00096    OSPTPROVHANDLE handle;
00097    struct osp_provider *next;
00098 };
00099 static struct osp_provider *providers;
00100 
00101 static int osp_build(struct ast_config *cfg, char *cat)
00102 {
00103    OSPTCERT TheAuthCert[MAX_CERTS];
00104    unsigned char Reqbuf[4096],LocalBuf[4096],AuthBuf[MAX_CERTS][4096];
00105    struct ast_variable *v;
00106    struct osp_provider *osp;
00107    int x,length,errorcode=0;
00108    int mallocd=0,i;
00109    char *cacerts[MAX_CERTS];
00110    const char *servicepoints[MAX_SERVICEPOINTS];
00111    OSPTPRIVATEKEY privatekey;
00112    OSPTCERT localcert;
00113    OSPTCERT *authCerts[MAX_CERTS];
00114 
00115    
00116    
00117    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00118    osp = providers;
00119    while(osp) {
00120       if (!strcasecmp(osp->name, cat))
00121          break;
00122       osp = osp->next;
00123    }
00124    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00125    if (!osp) {
00126       mallocd = 1;
00127       osp = malloc(sizeof(struct osp_provider));
00128       if (!osp) {
00129          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Out of memory!\n");
00130          return -1;
00131       }
00132       memset(osp, 0, sizeof(struct osp_provider));
00133       osp->handle = -1;
00134    }
00135    ast_copy_string(osp->name, cat, sizeof(osp->name));
00136    snprintf(osp->localpvtkey, sizeof(osp->localpvtkey) ,"%s/%s-privatekey.pem", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR, cat);
00137    snprintf(osp->localcert, sizeof(osp->localpvtkey), "%s/%s-localcert.pem", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR, cat);
00138    osp->maxconnections=OSP_DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS;
00139    osp->retrydelay = OSP_DEFAULT_RETRY_DELAY;
00140    osp->retrylimit = OSP_DEFAULT_RETRY_LIMIT;
00141    osp->timeout = OSP_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT;
00142    osp->source[0] = '\0';
00143    ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Building OSP Provider '%s'\n", cat);
00144    v = ast_variable_browse(cfg, cat);
00145    while(v) {
00146       if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "privatekey")) {
00147          if (v->value[0] == '/')
00148             ast_copy_string(osp->localpvtkey, v->value, sizeof(osp->localpvtkey));
00149          else
00150             snprintf(osp->localpvtkey, sizeof(osp->localpvtkey), "%s/%s", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR , v->value);
00151       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "localcert")) {
00152          if (v->value[0] == '/')
00153             ast_copy_string(osp->localcert, v->value, sizeof(osp->localcert));
00154          else
00155             snprintf(osp->localcert, sizeof(osp->localcert), "%s/%s", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR, v->value);
00156       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "cacert")) {
00157          if (osp->cacount < MAX_CERTS) {
00158             if (v->value[0] == '/')
00159                ast_copy_string(osp->cacerts[osp->cacount], v->value, sizeof(osp->cacerts[0]));
00160             else
00161                snprintf(osp->cacerts[osp->cacount], sizeof(osp->cacerts[0]), "%s/%s", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR, v->value);
00162             osp->cacount++;
00163          } else
00164             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Too many CA Certificates at line %d\n", v->lineno);
00165       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "servicepoint")) {
00166          if (osp->spcount < MAX_SERVICEPOINTS) {
00167             ast_copy_string(osp->servicepoints[osp->spcount], v->value, sizeof(osp->servicepoints[0]));
00168             osp->spcount++;
00169          } else
00170             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Too many Service points at line %d\n", v->lineno);
00171       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "maxconnections")) {
00172          if ((sscanf(v->value, "%d", &x) == 1) && (x > 0) && (x <= 1000)) {
00173             osp->maxconnections = x;
00174          } else
00175             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "maxconnections should be an integer from 1 to 1000, not '%s' at line %d\n", v->value, v->lineno);
00176       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "retrydelay")) {
00177          if ((sscanf(v->value, "%d", &x) == 1) && (x >= 0) && (x <= 10)) {
00178             osp->retrydelay = x;
00179          } else
00180             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "retrydelay should be an integer from 0 to 10, not '%s' at line %d\n", v->value, v->lineno);
00181       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "retrylimit")) {
00182          if ((sscanf(v->value, "%d", &x) == 1) && (x >= 0) && (x <= 100)) {
00183             osp->retrylimit = x;
00184          } else
00185             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "retrylimit should be an integer from 0 to 100, not '%s' at line %d\n", v->value, v->lineno);
00186       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "timeout")) {
00187          if ((sscanf(v->value, "%d", &x) == 1) && (x >= 200) && (x <= 10000)) {
00188             osp->timeout = x;
00189          } else
00190             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "timeout should be an integer from 200 to 10000, not '%s' at line %d\n", v->value, v->lineno);
00191       } else if (!strcasecmp(v->name, "source")) {
00192          ast_copy_string(osp->source, v->value, sizeof(osp->source));
00193       }
00194       v = v->next;
00195    }
00196    if (osp->cacount < 1) {
00197       snprintf(osp->cacerts[osp->cacount], sizeof(osp->cacerts[0]), "%s/%s-cacert.pem", ast_config_AST_KEY_DIR, cat);
00198       osp->cacount++;
00199    }
00200    for (x=0;x<osp->cacount;x++)
00201       cacerts[x] = osp->cacerts[x];
00202    for (x=0;x<osp->spcount;x++)
00203       servicepoints[x] = osp->servicepoints[x];
00204    
00205    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00206    osp->dead = 0;
00207    if (osp->handle > -1) {
00208       ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Deleting old handle for '%s'\n", osp->name);
00209       OSPPProviderDelete(osp->handle, 0);
00210    }
00211       
00212 
00213     length = 0;
00214    ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Loading private key for '%s' (%s)\n", osp->name, osp->localpvtkey);
00215     errorcode = loadPemPrivateKey(osp->localpvtkey,Reqbuf,&length);
00216     if (errorcode == 0)
00217     {
00218         privatekey.PrivateKeyData = Reqbuf;
00219         privatekey.PrivateKeyLength = length;
00220     }
00221     else
00222     {
00223          return -1;
00224     }
00225 
00226     length = 0;
00227    ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Loading local cert for '%s' (%s)\n", osp->name, osp->localcert);
00228     errorcode = loadPemCert(osp->localcert,LocalBuf,&length);
00229     if (errorcode == 0)
00230     {
00231         localcert.CertData = LocalBuf;
00232         localcert.CertDataLength = length;
00233     }
00234     else
00235     {
00236          return -1;
00237     }
00238 
00239     for (i=0;i<osp->cacount;i++)
00240     {
00241         length = 0;
00242       ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Loading CA cert %d for '%s' (%s)\n", i + 1, osp->name, osp->cacerts[i]);
00243         errorcode = loadPemCert(osp->cacerts[i],AuthBuf[i],&length);
00244         if (errorcode == 0)
00245         {
00246             TheAuthCert[i].CertData = AuthBuf[i];
00247             TheAuthCert[i].CertDataLength = length;
00248             authCerts[i] = &(TheAuthCert[i]);
00249         }
00250         else
00251         {
00252          return -1;        
00253       }
00254     }
00255    
00256    ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Creating provider handle for '%s'\n", osp->name);
00257    
00258    ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Service point '%s %d'\n", servicepoints[0], osp->spcount);
00259    
00260    if (OSPPProviderNew(osp->spcount, 
00261                    servicepoints, 
00262                   NULL, 
00263                   "localhost", 
00264                   &privatekey, 
00265                   &localcert, 
00266                   osp->cacount, 
00267                   (const OSPTCERT **)authCerts, 
00268                   1, 
00269                   300, 
00270                   osp->maxconnections, 
00271                   1, 
00272                   osp->retrydelay, 
00273                   osp->retrylimit, 
00274                   osp->timeout, 
00275                   "", 
00276                   "", 
00277                   &osp->handle)) {
00278       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Unable to initialize provider '%s'\n", cat);
00279       osp->dead = 1;
00280    }
00281    
00282    if (mallocd) {
00283       osp->next = providers;
00284       providers = osp;
00285    }
00286    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);   
00287    return 0;
00288 }
00289 
00290 static int show_osp(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
00291 {
00292    struct osp_provider *osp;
00293    char *search = NULL;
00294    int x;
00295    int found = 0;
00296    char *tokenalgo;
00297 
00298    if ((argc < 2) || (argc > 3))
00299       return RESULT_SHOWUSAGE;
00300    if (argc > 2)
00301       search = argv[2];
00302    if (!search) {
00303       switch (tokenformat) {
00304          case TOKEN_ALGO_BOTH:
00305             tokenalgo = "Both";
00306             break;
00307          case TOKEN_ALGO_UNSIGNED:
00308             tokenalgo = "Unsigned";
00309             break;
00310          case TOKEN_ALGO_SIGNED:
00311          default:
00312             tokenalgo = "Signed";
00313             break;
00314       }
00315       ast_cli(fd, "OSP: %s %s %s\n", initialized ? "Initialized" : "Uninitialized", hardware ? "Accelerated" : "Normal", tokenalgo);
00316    }
00317 
00318    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00319    osp = providers;
00320    while(osp) {
00321       if (!search || !strcasecmp(osp->name, search)) {
00322          if (found)
00323             ast_cli(fd, "\n");
00324          ast_cli(fd, " == OSP Provider '%s' ==\n", osp->name);
00325          ast_cli(fd, "Local Private Key: %s\n", osp->localpvtkey);
00326          ast_cli(fd, "Local Certificate: %s\n", osp->localcert);
00327          for (x=0;x<osp->cacount;x++)
00328             ast_cli(fd, "CA Certificate %d:  %s\n", x + 1, osp->cacerts[x]);
00329          for (x=0;x<osp->spcount;x++)
00330             ast_cli(fd, "Service Point %d:   %s\n", x + 1, osp->servicepoints[x]);
00331          ast_cli(fd, "Max Connections:   %d\n", osp->maxconnections);
00332          ast_cli(fd, "Retry Delay:       %d seconds\n", osp->retrydelay);
00333          ast_cli(fd, "Retry Limit:       %d\n", osp->retrylimit);
00334          ast_cli(fd, "Timeout:           %d milliseconds\n", osp->timeout);
00335          ast_cli(fd, "Source:            %s\n", strlen(osp->source) ? osp->source : "<unspecified>");
00336          ast_cli(fd, "OSP Handle:        %d\n", osp->handle);
00337          found++;
00338       }
00339       osp = osp->next;
00340    }
00341    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00342    if (!found) {
00343       if (search) 
00344          ast_cli(fd, "Unable to find OSP provider '%s'\n", search);
00345       else
00346          ast_cli(fd, "No OSP providers configured\n");
00347    }
00348    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
00349 }

00352 /*----------------------------------------------*
00353  *               Loads the Certificate          *
00354  *----------------------------------------------*/
00355 static int loadPemCert(unsigned char *FileName, unsigned char *buffer, int *len)
00356 {
00357     int length = 0;
00358     unsigned char *temp;
00359     BIO *bioIn = NULL;
00360     X509 *cert=NULL;
00361     int retVal = OSPC_ERR_NO_ERROR;
00362 
00363     temp = buffer;
00364     bioIn = BIO_new_file((const char*)FileName,"r");
00365     if (bioIn == NULL)
00366     {
00367       ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to find the File - %s \n",FileName);
00368       return -1;
00369     }
00370     else
00371     {
00372         cert = PEM_read_bio_X509(bioIn,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00373         if (cert == NULL)
00374         {
00375          ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to parse the Certificate from the File - %s \n",FileName);
00376          return -1;
00377         }
00378         else
00379         {
00380             length = i2d_X509(cert,&temp);
00381             if (cert == 0)
00382             {
00383             ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to parse the Certificate from the File - %s, Length=0 \n",FileName);
00384             return -1;
00385             }
00386             else
00387          {
00388                *len = length;
00389             }
00390         }
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (bioIn != NULL)
00394     {
00395         BIO_free(bioIn);
00396     }
00397 
00398     if (cert != NULL)
00399     {
00400         X509_free(cert);
00401     }
00402     return retVal;
00403 }
00404 
00405 /*----------------------------------------------*
00406  *               Loads the Private Key          *
00407  *----------------------------------------------*/
00408 static int loadPemPrivateKey(unsigned char *FileName, unsigned char *buffer, int *len)
00409 {
00410     int length = 0;
00411     unsigned char *temp;
00412     BIO *bioIn = NULL;
00413     RSA *pKey = NULL;
00414     int retVal = OSPC_ERR_NO_ERROR;
00415 
00416     temp = buffer;
00417 
00418     bioIn = BIO_new_file((const char*)FileName,"r");
00419     if (bioIn == NULL)
00420     {
00421       ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to find the File - %s \n",FileName);
00422       return -1;
00423     }
00424     else
00425     {
00426         pKey = PEM_read_bio_RSAPrivateKey(bioIn,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00427         if (pKey == NULL)
00428         {
00429          ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to parse the Private Key from the File - %s \n",FileName);
00430          return -1;
00431         }
00432         else
00433         {
00434             length = i2d_RSAPrivateKey(pKey,&temp);
00435             if (length == 0)
00436             {
00437             ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Failed to parse the Private Key from the File - %s, Length=0 \n",FileName);
00438             return -1;
00439             }
00440             else
00441             {
00442                 *len = length;
00443             }
00444         }
00445     }
00446     if (bioIn != NULL)
00447     {
00448         BIO_free(bioIn);
00449     }
00450 
00451     if (pKey != NULL)
00452     {
00453        RSA_free(pKey);
00454     }
00455     return retVal;
00456 }
00457 
00458 int ast_osp_validate(char *provider, char *token, int *handle, unsigned int *timelimit, char *callerid, struct in_addr addr, char *extension)
00459 {
00460    char tmp[256]="", *l, *n;
00461    char iabuf[INET_ADDRSTRLEN];
00462    char source[OSP_MAX] = ""; /* Same length as osp->source */
00463    char *token2;
00464    int tokenlen;
00465    struct osp_provider *osp;
00466    int res = 0;
00467    unsigned int authorised, dummy;
00468 
00469    if (!provider || !strlen(provider))
00470       provider = "default";
00471 
00472    token2 = ast_strdupa(token);
00473    if (!token2)
00474       return -1;
00475    tokenlen = ast_base64decode(token2, token, strlen(token));
00476    *handle = -1;
00477    if (!callerid)
00478       callerid = "";
00479    ast_copy_string(tmp, callerid, sizeof(tmp));
00480    ast_callerid_parse(tmp, &n, &l);
00481    if (!l)
00482       l = "";
00483    else {
00484       ast_shrink_phone_number(l);
00485       if (!ast_isphonenumber(l))
00486          l = "";
00487    }
00488    callerid = l;
00489    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00490    ast_inet_ntoa(iabuf, sizeof(iabuf), addr);
00491    osp = providers;
00492    while(osp) {
00493       if (!strcasecmp(osp->name, provider)) {
00494          if (OSPPTransactionNew(osp->handle, handle)) {
00495             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Unable to create OSP Transaction handle!\n");
00496          } else {
00497             ast_copy_string(source, osp->source, sizeof(source));
00498             res = 1;
00499          }
00500          break;
00501       }
00502       osp = osp->next;
00503    }
00504    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00505    if (res) {
00506       res = 0;
00507       dummy = 0;
00508       if (!OSPPTransactionValidateAuthorisation(*handle, iabuf, source, NULL, NULL, 
00509          callerid, OSPC_E164, extension, OSPC_E164, 0, "", tokenlen, token2, &authorised, timelimit, &dummy, NULL, tokenformat)) {
00510          if (authorised) {
00511             ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Validated token for '%s' from '%s@%s'\n", extension, callerid, iabuf);
00512             res = 1;
00513          }
00514       }
00515    }
00516    return res; 
00517 }
00518 
00519 static int check_dest(struct ast_osp_result *result, char *token, int tokensize)
00520 {
00521    OSPE_DEST_OSP_ENABLED enabled;
00522    OSPE_DEST_PROT prot;
00523    int res = 1;
00524 
00525    /* Check destination OSP version */
00526    if (!OSPPTransactionIsDestOSPEnabled(result->handle, &enabled) && (enabled == OSPE_OSP_FALSE)) {
00527       result->token[0] = 0;
00528    } else {
00529       ast_base64encode(result->token, token, tokensize, sizeof(result->token) - 1);
00530    }
00531 
00532    /* Check destination protocol */
00533    if (OSPPTransactionGetDestProtocol(result->handle, &prot)) {
00534       prot = OSPE_DEST_PROT_UNDEFINED;
00535    }
00536    switch(prot) {
00537    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_UNDEFINED:   /* Protocol is not configured, use SIP as default */
00538    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_SIP:
00539       ast_copy_string(result->tech, "SIP", sizeof(result->tech));
00540       break;
00541    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_H323_SETUP:
00542       ast_copy_string(result->tech, "H323", sizeof(result->tech));
00543       break;
00544    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_IAX:
00545       ast_copy_string(result->tech, "IAX", sizeof(result->tech));
00546       break;
00547    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_H323_LRQ:
00548    case OSPE_DEST_PROT_UNKNOWN:
00549    default:
00550       ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Unknown destination protocol '%d', skipping...\n", prot);
00551       res = 0;
00552    }
00553 
00554    return res;
00555 }
00556 
00557 int ast_osp_lookup(struct ast_channel *chan, char *provider, char *extension, char *callerid, struct ast_osp_result *result)
00558 {
00559    int cres;
00560    int res = 0;
00561    int counts;
00562    int tokenlen;
00563    unsigned int dummy=0;
00564    unsigned int timelimit;
00565    unsigned int callidlen;
00566    char callidstr[OSPC_CALLID_MAXSIZE] = "";
00567    struct osp_provider *osp;
00568    char source[OSP_MAX] = ""; /* Same length as osp->source */
00569    char callednum[2048]="";
00570    char callingnum[2048]="";
00571    char destination[2048]="";
00572    char token[2000];
00573    char tmp[256]="", *l, *n;
00574    char *devinfo = NULL;
00575 
00576    result->handle = -1;
00577    result->numresults = 0;
00578    result->tech[0] = '\0';
00579    result->dest[0] = '\0';
00580    result->token[0] = '\0';
00581 
00582    if (!provider || !strlen(provider))
00583       provider = "default";
00584 
00585    if (!callerid)
00586       callerid = "";
00587    ast_copy_string(tmp, callerid, sizeof(tmp));
00588    ast_callerid_parse(tmp, &n, &l);
00589    if (!l)
00590       l = "";
00591    else {
00592       ast_shrink_phone_number(l);
00593       if (!ast_isphonenumber(l))
00594          l = "";
00595    }
00596    callerid = l;
00597 
00598    if (chan) {
00599       cres = ast_autoservice_start(chan);
00600       if (cres < 0)
00601          return cres;
00602    }
00603    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00604    osp = providers;
00605    while(osp) {
00606       if (!strcasecmp(osp->name, provider)) {
00607          if (OSPPTransactionNew(osp->handle, &result->handle)) {
00608             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Unable to create OSP Transaction handle!\n");
00609          } else {
00610             ast_copy_string(source, osp->source, sizeof(source));
00611             res = 1;
00612          }
00613          break;
00614       }
00615       osp = osp->next;
00616    }
00617    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00618    if (res) {
00619       res = 0;
00620       /* No more than 10 back */
00621       counts = 10;
00622       dummy = 0;
00623       devinfo = pbx_builtin_getvar_helper (chan, "OSPPEER");
00624       if (!devinfo) {
00625          devinfo = "";
00626       }
00627       if (!OSPPTransactionRequestAuthorisation(result->handle, source, devinfo, 
00628            callerid,OSPC_E164, extension, OSPC_E164, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, &counts, &dummy, NULL)) {
00629          if (counts) {
00630             tokenlen = sizeof(token);
00631             result->numresults = counts - 1;
00632             callidlen = sizeof(callidstr);
00633             if (!OSPPTransactionGetFirstDestination(result->handle, 0, NULL, NULL, &timelimit, &callidlen, callidstr, 
00634                sizeof(callednum), callednum, sizeof(callingnum), callingnum, sizeof(destination), destination, 0, NULL, &tokenlen, token)) {
00635                ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Got destination '%s' and called: '%s' calling: '%s' for '%s' (provider '%s')\n",
00636                   destination, callednum, callingnum, extension, provider);
00637                /* Only support OSP server with only one duration limit */
00638                if (ast_channel_cmpwhentohangup (chan, timelimit) < 0) {
00639                   ast_channel_setwhentohangup (chan, timelimit);  
00640                }
00641                do {
00642                   if ((strlen(destination) > 2) && (check_dest(result, token, tokenlen))) {
00643                      /* Strip leading and trailing brackets */
00644                      destination[strlen(destination) - 1] = '\0';
00645                      snprintf(result->dest, sizeof(result->dest), "%s@%s", callednum, destination + 1);
00646                      res = 1;
00647                   } else {
00648                      if(result->numresults) {
00649                         result->numresults--;
00650                         callidlen = sizeof(callidstr);
00651                         if (!OSPPTransactionGetNextDestination(result->handle, OSPC_FAIL_INCOMPATIBLE_DEST, 0, NULL, NULL, &timelimit, &callidlen, 
00652                            callidstr, sizeof(callednum), callednum, sizeof(callingnum), callingnum, sizeof(destination), destination, 0, NULL, 
00653                            &tokenlen, token))
00654                         {
00655                            continue;
00656                         }
00657                      }
00658                   }
00659                   break;
00660                } while (1);
00661             }
00662          }
00663       }
00664       if (!res) {
00665          OSPPTransactionDelete(result->handle);
00666          result->handle = -1;
00667       }
00668       
00669    }
00670    if (!osp) 
00671       ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "OSP Provider '%s' does not exist!\n", provider);
00672    if (chan) {
00673       cres = ast_autoservice_stop(chan);
00674       if (cres < 0)
00675          return cres;
00676    }
00677    return res;
00678 }
00679 
00680 int ast_osp_next(struct ast_osp_result *result, int cause)
00681 {
00682    int res = 0;
00683    int tokenlen;
00684    unsigned int timelimit;
00685    unsigned int callidlen;
00686    char callidstr[OSPC_CALLID_MAXSIZE] = "";
00687    char callednum[2048]="";
00688    char callingnum[2048]="";
00689    char destination[2048]="";
00690    char token[2000];
00691 
00692    result->tech[0] = '\0';
00693    result->dest[0] = '\0';
00694    result->token[0] = '\0';
00695 
00696    if (result->handle > -1) {
00697       if (result->numresults) {
00698          tokenlen = sizeof(token);
00699          while(!res && result->numresults) {
00700             result->numresults--;
00701             callidlen = sizeof(callidstr);
00702             if (!OSPPTransactionGetNextDestination(result->handle, OSPC_FAIL_INCOMPATIBLE_DEST, 0, NULL, NULL, &timelimit, &callidlen, callidstr, 
00703                sizeof(callednum), callednum, sizeof(callingnum), callingnum, sizeof(destination), destination, 0, NULL, &tokenlen, token)) 
00704             {
00705                if ((strlen(destination) > 2) && check_dest(result, token, tokenlen)) {
00706                   /* Strip leading and trailing brackets */
00707                   destination[strlen(destination) - 1] = '\0';
00708                   snprintf(result->dest, sizeof(result->dest), "%s@%s", callednum, destination + 1);
00709                   res = 1;
00710                }
00711             }
00712          }
00713       }
00714       if (!res) {
00715          OSPPTransactionDelete(result->handle);
00716          result->handle = -1;
00717       }
00718    }
00719    return res;
00720 }
00721 
00722 static enum OSPEFAILREASON cause2reason(int cause)
00723 {
00724    switch(cause) {
00725    case AST_CAUSE_BUSY:
00726       return OSPC_FAIL_USER_BUSY;
00727    case AST_CAUSE_CONGESTION:
00728       return OSPC_FAIL_SWITCHING_EQUIPMENT_CONGESTION;
00729    case AST_CAUSE_UNALLOCATED:
00730       return OSPC_FAIL_UNALLOC_NUMBER;
00731    case AST_CAUSE_NOTDEFINED:
00732       return OSPC_FAIL_NORMAL_UNSPECIFIED;
00733    case AST_CAUSE_NOANSWER:
00734       return OSPC_FAIL_NO_ANSWER_FROM_USER;
00735    case AST_CAUSE_NORMAL:
00736    default:
00737       return OSPC_FAIL_NORMAL_CALL_CLEARING;
00738    }
00739 }
00740 
00741 int ast_osp_terminate(int handle, int cause, time_t start, time_t duration)
00742 {
00743    unsigned int dummy = 0;
00744    int res = -1;
00745    enum OSPEFAILREASON reason;
00746 
00747    time_t endTime = 0;
00748    time_t alertTime = 0;
00749    time_t connectTime = 0;
00750    unsigned isPddInfoPresent = 0;
00751    unsigned pdd = 0;
00752    unsigned releaseSource = 0;
00753    unsigned char *confId = "";
00754    
00755    reason = cause2reason(cause);
00756    if (OSPPTransactionRecordFailure(handle, reason))
00757       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Failed to record call termination for handle %d\n", handle);
00758    else if (OSPPTransactionReportUsage(handle, duration, start,
00759                 endTime,alertTime,connectTime,isPddInfoPresent,pdd,releaseSource,confId,
00760                       0, 0, 0, 0, &dummy, NULL))
00761       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Failed to report duration for handle %d\n", handle);
00762    else {
00763       ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "Completed recording handle %d\n", handle);
00764       OSPPTransactionDelete(handle);
00765       res = 0;
00766    }
00767    return res;
00768 }
00769 
00770 static int config_load(void)
00771 {
00772    struct ast_config *cfg;
00773    char *cat;
00774    struct osp_provider *osp, *prev = NULL, *next;
00775    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00776    osp = providers;
00777    while(osp) {
00778       osp->dead = 1;
00779       osp = osp->next;
00780    }
00781    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00782    cfg = ast_config_load("osp.conf");
00783    if (cfg) {
00784       if (!initialized) {
00785          cat = ast_variable_retrieve(cfg, "general", "accelerate");
00786          if (cat && ast_true(cat))
00787             if (OSPPInit(1)) {
00788                ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Failed to enable hardware accelleration, falling back to software mode\n");
00789                OSPPInit(0);
00790             } else
00791                hardware = 1;
00792          else
00793             OSPPInit(0);
00794          initialized = 1;
00795       }
00796       cat = ast_variable_retrieve(cfg, "general", "tokenformat");
00797       if (cat) {
00798          if ((sscanf(cat, "%d", &tokenformat) != 1) || (tokenformat < TOKEN_ALGO_SIGNED) || (tokenformat > TOKEN_ALGO_BOTH)) {
00799             tokenformat = TOKEN_ALGO_SIGNED;
00800             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "tokenformat should be an integer from 0 to 2, not '%s'\n", cat);
00801          }
00802       }
00803       cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, NULL);
00804       while(cat) {
00805          if (strcasecmp(cat, "general"))
00806             osp_build(cfg, cat);
00807          cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, cat);
00808       }
00809       ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00810    } else
00811       ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "No OSP configuration found.  OSP support disabled\n");
00812    ast_mutex_lock(&osplock);
00813    osp = providers;
00814    while(osp) {
00815       next = osp->next;
00816       if (osp->dead) {
00817          if (prev)
00818             prev->next = next;
00819          else
00820             providers = next;
00821          /* XXX Cleanup OSP structure first XXX */
00822          free(osp);
00823       } else 
00824          prev = osp;
00825       osp = next;
00826    }
00827    ast_mutex_unlock(&osplock);
00828    return 0;
00829 }
00830 
00831 static char show_osp_usage[] = 
00832 "Usage: show osp\n"
00833 "       Displays information on Open Settlement Protocol\n";
00834 
00835 static struct ast_cli_entry cli_show_osp = 
00836 { { "show", "osp", NULL }, show_osp, "Displays OSP information", show_osp_usage };
00837 
00838 int reload(void)
00839 {
00840    config_load();
00841    ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "XXX Should reload OSP config XXX\n");
00842    return 0;
00843 }
00844 
00845 int load_module(void)
00846 {
00847    config_load();
00848    ast_cli_register(&cli_show_osp);
00849    return 0;
00850 }
00851 
00852 int unload_module(void)
00853 {
00854    /* Can't unload this once we're loaded */
00855    return -1;
00856 }
00857 
00858 char *description(void)
00859 {
00860    return "Open Settlement Protocol Support";
00861 }
00862 
00863 int usecount(void)
00864 {
00865    /* We should never be unloaded */
00866    return 1;
00867 }
00868 
00869 char *key()
00870 {
00871    return ASTERISK_GPL_KEY;
00872 }
